title: Pixel 4a instability after Jan 5 sec update
content:
Assuming that this is latest security update or system update related due to behavior  

Have Android 11 and the Jan 5th update on my phone. Earlier this week, phone restarted to finish installing updates. Now several apps immediately crash on startup, including Gmail, LinkedIn, okcupid, and boost (reddit). Additionally, I will regularly see the "stopped working" message flash when doing other tasks on the phone but no idea of what crashed and restarted. 

Have tried uninstalling and reinstalling apps with no success.

Device has over 50 gb free storage
